ruleResults.name: Ensure Deployment has more than one replica configured
ruleResults.messageOnFailure: Incorrect value for key `replicas` - running 2 or more replicas will increase the availability of the service

ruleResults.name: Ensure each container has a read-only root filesystem
ruleResults.messageOnFailure: Incorrect value for key `readOnlyRootFilesystem` - set to 'true' to protect filesystem from potential attacks

ruleResults.name: Prevent containers from accessing underlying host
ruleResults.messageOnFailure: Invalid key `hostPath` - refrain from using this mount to prevent an attack on the underlying host

ruleResults.name: Prevent workload from using the default namespace
ruleResults.messageOnFailure: Incorrect value for key `namespace` - use an explicit namespace instead of the default one (`default`)
